mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members (userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img) VALUES (#{userid}, #{password}, #{username}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{profile_img});
mapper.select: SELECT userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img FROM members WHERE member_no=#{member_no};
SELECT userid, password, username, birthday, email, profile_img FROM members ORDER BY member_no DESC
SELECT * FROM members WHERE userid=#{userid} and password=#{password}
